Lang.firstContText1: Do you want to obtain information on particular persons or investigate facts/circumstances, but do not have enough time and means for this purpose?
Lang.firstContText2: Our team is ready to work 24/7 in order to obtain the service you want quickly and efficiently.
Lang.firstContText3: Contact us for more information: (WhatsApp, Telegram, Signal) 599 06 27 50 (for females) or 599 06 67 50 (for males)
Lang.thirdContText1: Protect yourself from the disclosure of personal and business information as well
Lang.thirdContText2: We work with full privacy protection!
Lang.FourthContText1: The P&S Group is staffed with experienced law enforcement and operational personnel with the knowledge and skills necessary to obtain information quickly, efficiently and confidentially.
Lang.FourthContText2: If needed, our team is ready to carry out the necessary work to provide services outside the country
Lang.FifthContText1: Do you have questions in the legal field or are you in need of the assistance of a lawyer?
Lang.FifthContText2: - We offer legal services in various fields of law.
Lang.aboutUsText1: P&S Group is staffed with personnel with many years of experience in the field of operational and investigative activities.
Lang.aboutUsText2: Our team is ready to work 24/7 to get the service you want quickly and efficiently.
Lang.aboutUsText3: We act in accordance with the law and in full compliance with confidentiality.
